name: Nemo Roamer Double Sleeping Pad
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Sink into comfort on a sleeping pad that may just rival your bed at home. The Roamer is a self-inflating sleeping pad that has two valves to make micro-adjustments, so you can dial in the perfect firmness. With more than 10cm between you and the ground, it’s plush and cushy, so you and your partner can drift off into dreamland while other campers are still counting sheep.Soft top fabric and durable bottom fabric add strength and comfort where you need it.Open cell, dual-axis foam coring reduces weight and makes set-up easy.Integrated toggles allow you to connect pads. Two Roamer XL Wide pads toggle together to make a queen-sized mattress, so you can use bedding from home.Packs down to half the size of its similarly rated competition.Rated for temperatures from -34°C and up.Two zero profile valves suck in air for fast set-up, and let you make precise adjustments.Vortex™ high-capacity pump sack makes inflation even faster.One-way dump valve for fast deflating.Includes the Vortex pump sack, a Velcro® strap, repair kit and duffle storage and transport bag.Covered by Nemo’s lifetime warranty.
